channel.title: @@@@ Download hamachi ere "dunno if its in wrong secion" dont point it out
channel.description:
This is a n00b guide :P
For those ppl who..... cant find the download link to download hamachi here it is
URL = [url=http://www.hamachi.cc/download/]http://www.hamachi.cc/download/[/url] There :P
Choose ur version and thats basically it.
once its downloaded click the triangle thingy and choose either to create or join a server :]
heres an example
say someones server was called bobbyscape lawl and it needed hamachi. say there hamachi network was bobby. u would type bobby in the network field. and say the pass was "hair" u would type that in the password field and click join simple :]
N00b guide pl0x[br][size=1]Posted at: December 03, 2006, 03:21:24 PM[/size][hr]pl0x reply[br][size=1]Posted at: December 03, 2006, 03:21:57 PM[/size][hr]use it :]
